Well, now that we know that the mother was fucking the daughter's boyfriend in 6+ (probably at the behest of the old man, given that they were listening to/watching a recording of them fucking at the end of 6+), there will probably be a massive strain in the relationship between the mother and daughter. While the mother is going to get all the old man's money, it's not going to change the fact that the daughter is pregnant now, and that it isn't going to correspond to her boyfriend having sex with her. Good end? I'd barely call it bitter sweet, provided the old fuck actually died (although, from that height, I sincerely doubt he did, and there's a possibility that he was saved off-panel by mindful watch crews).
